welcome_message_body: Welcome to Noisy-le-Grand, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, architectural wonders, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, providing VIP services and amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals (2A-2G).

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster connection.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving mainly regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
